message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000. I believe this reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
